attributes.comment:
My husband and I are currently in the process of adopting a baby girl from China.
Due to the lengthening of the wait time of getting a referral from China, we will have
to be refingerprinted and our 171 H will likely expire before we would travel. We
can accept that we will have to pay the fees again to be able to continue in this
adoption process. However, the fee increase, puts such a burden on the adopting
family and could very likely cause many families to question whether they could
afford the adoption process.

Would you please consider the orphans of this world and adopting families as you
make this decision about the fee increase?

Sincerely,
Ira and Elizabeth Burge
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Elizabeth W. Burge
